Feature.Name: Grappler
Feature.Text: You’ve developed the skills necessary to hold your own in close-quarters grappling. You gain the following benefits: • You have advantage on attack rolls against a creature you are grappling. • You can use your action to try to pin a creature grappled by you. To do so, make another grapple check. If you succeed, you and the creature are both restrained until the grapple ends.
